attributes.additional_details: I would like an extension as me and thousands of other learner drivers who have passed our theories within the last 2 years have not been able to take any driving lessons or book driving tests during this pandemic, therefore wasting almost a years worth of a passed certificate, I find it unfair that MOTs were extended by 6 months yet us who have passed our theory tests now have to re-set the test.
attributes.background: I would like it passed in parliament that dvsa have to gove a 6 months extension on all passed theory tests
